trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.

The DataGridCell can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: 와 함께에서 사용할 수는 DataGridCell는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>가져오거나 셀의 값을 설정 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a DataGridCell causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the DataGridCell.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>속성은 DataGridCell 인해 포커스가 DataGridCell로 지정 된 셀으로 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
The number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
The number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
Gets or sets the number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 열의 수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ColumnNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: ColumnNumber 값을 사용 하 여 지정는 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>에 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>연관는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> is identical to a second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> 는 두 번째 동일 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>두 번째 개체는 첫 번째;와 같은 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 추가할 수 있는 해시 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 고유 하 게 식별 하는 숫자는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 행의 수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the RowNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: RowNumber 값을 사용 하 여 지정는 <xref:System.Data.DataRow>에 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>연관는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 행 번호 및 셀의 열 번호를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: 행 번호 및 열 번호를 포함 하는 문자열입니다.
